titleStmt.title: News from the west; or, A pleasant relation of what lately happened in that part of the world. To a new tune, or, The delights of the bottle, or, Would you know how we drink, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come listen all you who to mirth are inclin'd,".
Place of publication from and publication date conjectured by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
